short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate personalized LinkedIn messages by leveraging AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's a tough job market out there. To land a job involves reaching out to multiple recruiters on LinkedIn with regards to job postings.
It's incredibly tiring to write a message tailored to the job description and do it a 1000 times.

Linkify makes this easier for you.
Linkify will analyse the job posting and your LinkedIn profile and automatically construct a tailored cover letter for you. 
It ensures that the message aligns perfectly with the specific requirements and qualifications sought by the employer. This streamlines the process, saving a lot of time and effort for you.
